boardgame.description:
From the publisher:

Featuring beautifully detailed painted miniatures, X-Wing is a two-player game of dramatic starfighter battles set in the Star Wars universe. You and your opponent take command of Resistance X-wings and First Order TIE fighters, then battle head-to-head for the fate of the galaxy.

Secretly plot your maneuvers, fly at your enemies, take aim, and fire. It takes just minutes to learn the rules, but the nearly limitless possibilities for squad building, along with the ability to expand your fleet with other ships from the game’s expansions, ensure that you’ll find plenty of Star Wars action to explore and enjoy for years to come!

X-Wing is a two-player miniatures game of fantastic, high-speed dogfights. Now, for the first time, you can enjoy these dramatic space battles with the incredible new starfighters from The Force Awakens!

The Force Awakens Core Set is the heart of your X-Wing experience and contains everything that you and a friend need to start playing, including three painted plastic ships – one Resistance T-70 X-wing and two TIE/fo fighters.

listing.notes:
Fantasy Flight Games (FFGSWX36)
Fantasy Flight Games is proud to announce that The Force Awakens Core Set has now arrived for X-Wing! Featuring beautifully detailed painted miniatures, X-Wing is a two-player game of dramatic star fighter battles set in the Star Wars universe. You and your opponent take command of Resistance X-wings and First Order TIE fighters, then battle head-to-head for the fate of the galaxy. Secretly plot your maneuvers, fly at your enemies, take aim, and fire. It takes just minutes to learn the rules, but the nearly limitless possibilities for squad building, along with the ability to expand your fleet with other ships from the game's expansions, ensure that you'll find plenty of Star Wars action to explore and enjoy for years to come! Man your ships... And may the Force be with you!

Please note this is a PRE-ORDER. This item will not ship before September 21st.
PRICE INCLUDES SHIPPING AND HANDLING
This item is shrink-wrapped and in factory fresh condition and the price includes shipping to UK locations through Royal Mail.
Thanks for looking and have a great game!
(We only ship to the UK currently)
Seller: crispy116
Reserved: Auction for BGG user CJHacker.

Everything is in like new condition. Only played once and my GF hated it so I need to clear it out.
For payment, I prefer Square Cash (see https://cash.me/ ) which is free and really easy to use. If that really doesn't work for you let me know.
For shipping, lets say $5 in the USA. Item is currently in California Bay Area but I get down to LA often so we could arrange a pick up in either area.
Thanks and please let me know if you have any other questions.

I have the core set listed which was opened but never played and the Millennium Falcon and Slave I, which are included for this price as well. Millennium Falcon and Slave I are still in original box but they were played with so I would consider the box good condition and the minis very good.

Played once.
Includes:
-Force Awakens Core Set. Ships, cards, tokens, and box: Like new. -Millennium Falcon Expansion. Ship: Good. Ship missing one of two pegs for the stand (can be switched with Slave I if desired). Still perfectly functional but sits lower on table. Model, cards, and tokens in like new condition. Box: Good, with tear. Insert missing top piece of plastic. -Slave I Expansion. Ship, cards, tokens: Like new. Box: Good, with tear.
Expansions set boxes and inserts can be included or not included.
From a nonsmoking home in Virginia, zip 23454. Enjoy!
